entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
